attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLFF2zAzKUB4agDRoHe_description
attribs.current: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLFF2zAzKUB4agDRoHg_description
attribs.current: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If it is Large or smaller, it is also grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space. The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at one time. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, each target grappled by it takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a DC 14 Strength and succeeding.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFF2zAzKUB4agDRoHh_description
attribs.current: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFF2zBcQrMK2soKyMh_description
attribs.current: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 ft. until the end of its next turn.

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current: Exhaustion, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Prone, Restrained, Unconscious

attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current: Acid; Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing From Nonmagical Attacks

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLFF5CZFMD90M1HVQSN_description
attribs.current: The mamura makes three claw attacks and one whiptail sting attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLFF5CZFMD90M1HVQSO_description
attribs.current: On hit, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 round. The poison duration is cumulative with multiple failed saving throws

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLFF5CZFMD90M1HVQSP_description
attribs.current: On hit, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 poison damage. If the target is also poisoned by the mamura’s claws, it takes another 1d6 poison damage at the start of each of its turns while the poisoning remains in effect

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFF5CZFMD90M1HVQSQ_description
attribs.current: Attackers never gain advantage on attacks or bonus damage against a mamura from the presence of nearby allies.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFF5CZFMD90M1HVQSR_description
attribs.current: The mamura has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFF5CZFMD90M1HVQSS_description
attribs.current: In darkness or dim light, the mamura has advantage on Stealth checks. It can attempt to hide as a bonus action at the end of its turn if it’s in dim light or darkness.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFF5CZFMD90M1HVQST_description
attribs.current: Because of the mamura’s alien and forbidding aura, any spellcaster within 20 feet of the mamura must make a successful DC 14 spellcasting check before casting a spell; if the check fails, they lose their action but not the spell slot. They must also make a successful DC 14 spellcasting check to maintain concentration if they spend any part of their turn inside the aura.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFF5CZFMD90M1HVQSU_description
attribs.current: The mamura doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current:
bludgeoning, piercing, and 
slashing from nonmagical weapons

attribs.name: npc_languages
attribs.current: Common, Elvish, Goblin, Sylvan, Void Speech

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLehz3qTOC2hYa50ai8_description
attribs.current: Mechanically, the armor is a minotaur. It behaves as an additional opponent, albeit under the control of the wearer. While inside the armor, the wearer gains advantage to saving throws against spells. The armor does not interfere with the wearer’s actions or abilities. Treat the armor and wearer as two separate targets when resolving spells and effects. The wearer may be targeted normally but is immune to attacks and effects that would force it out of the armor. If the armor reaches 0 hp, it “dies” and the wearer is ejected.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLeEBLx7UfZWZjH0rK9_description
attribs.current: If the armor moves at least 10 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 ft. away and knocked prone.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLeEBLx7UfZWZjH0rKA_description
attribs.current: The armor can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLeEBLx7UfZWZjH0rKB_description
attribs.current: At the start of its turn, the armor can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLehuOeumQKZQgsmroe_description
attribs.current: Mechanically, the armor is a minotaur. It behaves as an additional opponent, albeit under the control of the wearer. While inside the armor, the wearer gains advantage to saving throws against spells. The armor does not interfere with the wearer’s actions or abilities. Treat the armor and wearer as two separate targets when resolving spells and effects. The wearer may be targeted normally but is immune to attacks and effects that would force it out of the armor. If the armor reaches 0 hp, it “dies” and the wearer is ejected.
